chapter.metadata: Your name is Ben. A senior at LF high, you have made quite a name for yourself in the last 4 years. Youâ€™ve had many achievements on and off the field. A model student, the perfect life. You wake up and slowly lift your head from your desk. You look around to find that your fellow classmates and even your teacher seem to have left already. You must have slept through your last period. The class was never very exciting anyway.
chapter.text: You wake up in a large concrete room. ^1500A light fixture swings from the ceiling.
